subSubSection.paragraph:
sanamus Tottenham, 1955: 163
(
Philonthus
; subgenus
Spatulonthus
; replacement name for
nitidicollis Klug. Also
cited from South Africa and Rhodesia ).
- DISTRIBUTION: South Africa , Zimbabwe , Mozambique , Rwanda .

nitidicollis Klug, 1855: 644
(
Philonthus
; [ preoccupied ]; Type locality: Mossambique: Sena).

(
Philonthus
; subgenus
Spatulonthus
; form of
sanamus
;

klugi Bordoni, 1984: 344
(
Philonthus
; replacement name for
nitidicollis Klug
).
- DISTRIBUTION: Senegal , Sierra Leone , Benin , Congo , Sudan , Tanzania .
